```{r eval=FALSE}
library(shiny)

# module UI:
mod1_ui <- function(id) {
  ns <- NS(id)

  # ----downloadHandler----
  tagList(
    tags$h3(
      "We're in mod1 UI"
    ),

    downloadButton(ns("download_here"), "Download")
  )
}

# module server:
mod1_server <- function(id) {
  moduleServer(
    id = id, 
    module = function(input, output, session) {
      # ----downloadHandler----
      # Our dataset:
      data <- mtcars

      output$download_here <- downloadHandler(
        filename = function() {
          paste("data-", Sys.Date(), ".csv", sep="")
        },
        content = function(file) {
          write.csv(data, file)
        }
      )
    }
  )
}

# app UI:
ui <- fluidPage(
  mod1_ui(id = "thismod")
)

# app server:
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  # Get return value from module server:
  k <- mod1_server(id = "thismod")

  # Observe changes in the return value:
  observeEvent(k(), {
    print("Didn't I throw an error!?")
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
